name: github
title: GitHub
description: Work with issues, pull requests, manage workflows, search repositories and stay on top of notifications
author: thomaslombart

commands.name: my-pull-requests
commands.title: My Pull Requests
commands.description: List pull requests you created, participated in, or were mentioned in.

commands.name: search-pull-requests
commands.title: Search Pull Requests
commands.description: Search recent pull requests globally in all repositories.

commands.name: create-pull-request
commands.title: Create Pull Request
commands.description: Create a pull request in one of your GitHub repositories.

commands.name: open-issues
commands.title: Open Issues
commands.description: List issues assigned to you or mentioning you.

commands.name: search-issues
commands.title: Search Issues
commands.description: Search recent issues globally in all repositories.

commands.name: create-issue
commands.title: Create Issue
commands.description: Create an issue in one of your GitHub repositories.

commands.name: create-branch
commands.title: Create Branch
commands.description: Create a branch in one of your GitHub repositories

commands.name: search-repositories
commands.title: Search Repositories
commands.description: Search in your public or private repositories by name.

preferences.name: includeForks
preferences.title: Options
preferences.label: Include Forks
preferences.description: Includes forked repositories in search results

preferences.name: includeArchived
preferences.label: Include Archived
preferences.description: Includes archived repositories in search results

preferences.name: displayOwnerName
preferences.label: Display Owner Names
preferences.description: Display owner name alongside repository name in search results

commands.name: workflow-runs
commands.title: Workflow Runs
commands.description: Manage workflow runs for a selected GitHub repository.

commands.name: notifications
commands.title: Notifications
commands.description: List inbox notifications from all repositories or a selected repository.

commands.name: unread-notifications
commands.title: Unread Notifications
commands.description: Shows unread notifications in the macOS menu bar.

preferences.label: Always Show
preferences.name: alwaysShow
preferences.description: Show the menu bar extra even when you don't have any unread notifications.

preferences.name: personalAccessToken
preferences.title: GitHub Token
preferences.description: Your GitHub's personal access token. Required scopes: notifications repo read:org read:user read:project.
